name: Train Filler
description:
A local competitive multiplayer game where you spray people out of a hose to try and fill a train car more than your opponent!

Features:

  • Highly-realistic person-spraying hose physics
  • Standard train obstacles such as water wheels, pistons, giant scissors, and moving ceilings/walls/floors (as in all trains, the ceilings, walls, and floors all have holes in them)

Made for Train Jam 2016.
